name: Untitled shooter (Screaming Bros)
description:
Game for I can't draw Jam (2020).
The goal of the game: complete the levels by collecting keys to open doors and simultaneously killing enemies.

Very small shooter with two different levels. Initially, it was planned to have 4 levels, but I didn't manage to :(
Almost all the resources for the game were made by me-Andrey Dilman (sometimes my friends helped me).
Enjoy the game!

Special thanks to:
Anastasia Mareycheva.
Sophia Gerdyk.
Nikita Prikhodchenko.
Community Easy FPS Engine that helped solve problems.
